type: The development of criteria and documentation to support staffing strategy and competitive processes for the Marine Planning and Conservation Directorate.
short_summary: Interested vendors shall demonstrate experience in designing and implementing staffing strategies for conservation organizations, particularly in the marine sector.
description: Description of the Requirement: This bid solicitation is being issued to satisfy the relevant requirement identified in the attached documentation.(Attached PDF link: 30002555_-_npp_en.pdf)
